body: There's like 4 freaking hackers and I'm really really angry.

title: mod come to nexus01

replies.body:
Moderation has dropped to a deep low, and the staff know. Generally you have to make player reports and such now, but once exams over mods will most likely start being on.

@OP i will record them, names?
